title: 2 BR, 2nd Floor Apt. - $2,200
posting_body: ['Offered is a well maintained, very spacious 2 bedroom apartment with screened-in back porch and parking.', '2nd floor in a 3 family home.', 'Recently painted, new flooring in Bath and Kitchen.', 'Hardwood floors throughout rest of apt.', 'Decorative fireplace and built-in china closet.', 'A must see!', '7 minute walk to the train and close to highway.', 'Walk to downtown for shopping and great dining.', "There's a lot to do in this great city!", 'Electric stove.', 'Heat and hot water are all by natural gas.', 'Tenant responsible for utility bills (gas and electric).', '2 on-site parking spots.', 'Laundry hookups available in basement.', 'Unit is non-smoking and pets are not allowed.', "Upon signing lease, 1st and second months' rent and security deposit of $1,200 would be required.", 'Apartment is available 9/1.', 'Please email me to set up an appointment to view.']
